items.title: Report:  Facebook has Started Encrypting Links to Counter Browsers' Anti-Tracking Measures - Slashdot
items.content_html:
Masayuki Hatta@mhatta Report: Facebook has Started Encrypting Links to Counter Browsers' Anti-Tracking Measures - Slashdot

Report: Facebook has Started Encrypting Links to Counter Browsers' Anti-Tracking Measures - Slashdot

"Facebook has started to use a different URL scheme for site links," writes the technology blog Ghacks, "to combat URL stripping technologies that browsers such as Firefox or Brave use to improve privacy and prevent user tracking." Some sites, including Facebook, add parameters to the web address f...

Article URL: https://tech.slashdot.org/story/22/07/18/0433238/report-facebook-has-started-encrypting-links-to-counter-browsers-anti-tracking-measures
